name: AMAZON__SEARCH_PRODUCTS
description: Searches Amazon for a keyword and returns a list of products. Allows sorting and filtering for deals.

keyword.description: The search term or product name to look for (e.g., 'wireless headphones').

num_results.description: The desired number of products to return. Defaults to 20.

sort_by.description: The sorting order for the results. Available options: 'FEATURED', 'PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH', 'PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW', 'REVIEW_RANK', 'NEWEST_ARRIVALS', 'BEST_SELLERS'. Defaults to 'FEATURED'.

find_deals.description: Set to true to search only within Amazon's 'Today's Deals'. Defaults to false.

name: AMAZON__GET_PRODUCT_DETAILS
description: Fetches and parses detailed information from a single Amazon product page URL.

product_url.description: The full URL of the Amazon product page you want details for.
